name: Dryad's Quest
description:
Description

The Dryad of the Indian River Lagoon is in trouble! As sea levels rise, she finds herself stuck on an island amidst dead and dying plants. Use her magic to breathe life back into this ecosystem.

Interface

Point-and-click. Use your nature powers to resurrect the dead plants around you.

Source Code

Available at https://github.com/cidneyhamilton/LudumDare47 .

Credits

Design, writing, code, sound, and art by me. Music generated by Wolfram Tones. Made with Ink and Unity.
